creditline: Gift of William C. Hayes, Class of 1924

texts.textentryhtml: Said to be from Gebelein (Naga el-Gherira), Egypt; acquired by William C. Hayes, Class of 1924, possibly during the Metropolitan Museum of Art excavations at Thebes (Hayes active 1927-1931); given to the Musum in 1930 by Hayes.

bibliography.boilertext: New Jersey's place in cultural history, 16,000 B.C.-A.D. 1625: a comparative exhibition, (Trenton, NJ: New Jersey State Museum, 1957).
